page.title: 13PRESSING LOCAL ISSUES/FEARS
page.content: CONOCO OIL COMPANY'S SEISMIC TESTS INDICATE THE{POSSIBLE EXISTENCE OF AN {OIL RESERVOIR}BETWEEN BUXTED AND MAYFIELD. THEY HAVE APPLIED FOR PLANNING PERMISSION TO DRILL A BOREHOLE IN THE VICINITY.THIS IS CAUSING THE POPULATION IN THE AREA GREAT CONCERN. APPROVAL WOULD MEAN INCREASED LORRY TRAFFIC WHICH COULD AMOUNT TO{1000%.}THE DAMAGE TO AN AREA CLASSIFIED AS ONE OF EXCEPTIONAL NATURAL BEAUTY WOULD BE DISASTROUS.THE DANGER TO RESIDENTS DUE TO TRAFFIC MOVEMENTS IS HORRIFYING. THESE FACTORS WOULD BE GREATLY EXACERBATED SHOULD CONSTRUCTION OF A GATHERING STATION PROVE VIABLE. THE MAIN CONCERN OF THE DISTRICT COUNCIL TO DATE IS THE LACK OF SPECIFIC INFORMATION ON SUCH FUTURE EXPLOITATION WITH THE CONSEQUENT SOCIAL DISTRESS AND UPHEAVAL.THE APPLICATION IS BEING INVESTIGATED.
